name: Flying Hamster HD
summary: Flying Hamster HD is a high-definition version of Flying Hamster game previous released as PlayStation minis release for earlier PlayStation platforms as well as for PS Vita. The game itself is the same, featuring 6 levels in total, following the story of Newton, the flying hamster whose girlfriend got kidnapped by a giant eagle, as he is fighting his way through waves of other animals, robots and aliens trying to save his beloved. The game is presented as a horizontally scrolling shooter much like Apidya where you can use single or auto-fire and collect other weapons and upgrades by destroying your enemies.
